item.title: Understand Scoping in JavaScript
item.description: Scoping in JavaScript is an important concept that provides the rules for variable accessibility from different parts of your code.

item.title: How To Display JavaScript Objects
item.description: While primitives in JavaScript are values themselves, everything else, including arrays and functions, are objects.

item.title: Bridging the Gap: Basic Design Principles for Developers
item.description: Developers typically focus on the coding and development aspects of a project.
